DOC.detailed_description: Objective : To assess value use PVI monitor patient 's intra-operative volume status continuously observe application stroke volume variation ( SVV ) pleth variability index ( PVI ) correlation patient undergoing intestinal tumor surgery . Methods : 50 patient undergoing elective intestinal tumor surgery enrol , ASAⅠ-Ⅲ , age 18-65 year . After induction general anesthesia , cardiac index ( CI ) , cardiac output ( CO ) , stroke volume variability ( SVV ) , stroke volume index ( SVI ) monitor Vigileo system , pleth variability index ( PVI ) perfusion index ( PI ) monitor Massion Radical 7 system . During surgery , goal direct fluid therapy conduct accord data CI、SVI SVV . Heart rate ( HR ) , mean arterial pressure ( MAP ) , central venous pressure ( CVP ) , CO , CI , SVI , SVV , PI , PVI record induction anesthesia ( T1 ) , make surgical incision ( T2 ) , perform intestinal anastomosis ( T3 ) close abdominal incision ( T4 ) . And calculate correlation SVV PVI use Pearson Correlation Analysis different time point .
